  • Method Details

    • checkMove

      public boolean checkMove​(java.lang.String s, java.lang.String e, java.lang.Boolean inturn)
      This function returns true if the move given in strings is valid move.
      Parameters:
      s - the starting position in string
      e - the ending position in string.
      inturn - a boolean indicates the color of the playing player
      Returns:
      true if the move given in strings is valid move.

    • applyMove

      public void applyMove​(java.lang.String s, java.lang.String e)
      This function apply a valid move from s to e on the board. it takes the position as Strings.
      Parameters:
      s - the starting position in String.
      e - the ending position in String.

    • inCheck

      public java.lang.Boolean inCheck​(Position p, java.lang.Boolean isWhite)
      Checks if the piece in position p is checked from pieces of the color isWhite
      Parameters:
      p - the position to be checked for check.
      isWhite - the color of the piece to check from.
      Returns:
      True if this piece in p is checked by pieces of color isWhite

    • inCheck

      public boolean inCheck​(java.lang.Boolean white)
      Checks if the king with the color "white" is checked. isWhite the color of the king to check for
      Parameters:
      white - the color of the piece to check for.
      Returns:
      True if the king with the color "white" is checked.
